about_the_game:
Enter the magical world of Bestowment. Assemble your army as you collect cards containing ferocious creatures and powerful spells in your search for the gods who may or may not have the answers you seek.

Story:

Who are you exactly and how did you get here? Your strange powers to control monsters are proof you are destined for greatness. Journey across the land assembling your army as you face off against powerful foes and encounter unexpected obstacles in this Collectible Card Game where choice matters and each card in your deck has a purpose.

Features:

  • Collect over 500+ unique cards

  • A sprawling single player campaign experience where no 2 playthroughs will play the same

  • Encounter a multitude of powerful foes and bosses each with their own playstyles and decks

  • Discover random events that will shape your deck for better or for worse

  • Earn cards and currency in the single player campaign that you can use to construct your own deck for online play

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT1030 / AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Bestowment is a roguelike deck builder meets collectible card game where you build your army and defy the gods. Utilize hundreds of unique cards in heated battles where no 2 runs play out the same!
